all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Behold and lo, mine eyes are upon you, and the heavens and the earth are in mine hands, and the riches of eternity are mine to give.
Doctrine and Covenants 67:2
Quote of the Day
"There is rejoicing in heaven over those who return. It is not too late to come back."
Elder S. Mark Palmer | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
